column3: Latest;Sihanoukville:------ On the afternoon of February 25
column5: people were shocked to find a dead dolphin dumped under a bridge on Koh Puos.------According to residents
column6: the dolphin was trapped by fishermen and died in nets. However
column7: there was no further confirmation.------ Nhek Chamroeun
column8: director of the Preah Sihanouk provincial Department of Agriculture
column10: told local media by telephone that he would immediately send a fishery official to confirm the research. ------ KBN
